newsitem.title: DUBAI: Dubai National Insurance doubles 1996 profit, div.
newsitem.headline: Dubai National Insurance doubles 1996 profit, div.

text.p: Full Name: Dubai National Insurance P.S.C.
Note - The company has a paid-up capital of 40 million dirhams. The company said total gross premiums underwritten for the year amounted to 61.23 million dirhams versus 45.77 million.
During the year the company inaugurated a branch in Beirut.
